mapper.sql: id, personCode, personName,deptCode,deptName,sex,email,tel,spellCode,strokeCode, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID
mapper.select: select yb_person.id, yb_person.personCode, yb_person.personName, yb_person.deptCode, yb_person.deptName, yb_person.sex, yb_person.tel, yb_person.email, yb_person.spellCode, yb_person.strokeCode, case when t_user.user_id is not null then 1 else 0 end STATE, yb_person.COMMENTS, yb_person.IS_DELETEMARK, yb_person.CREATE_USER_ID, yb_person.MODIFY_USER_ID, yb_person.MODIFY_TIME, yb_person.CREATE_TIME from yb_person LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_user.USERNAME = yb_person.personCode where 1=1 and yb_person.id =#{ ybPerson.id} and (yb_person.personCode like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.personCode} ,'%') or yb_person.personName like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.personCode} ,'%')) and yb_person.personName like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.personName} ,'%') and yb_person.COMMENTS like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.comments} ,'%') and yb_person.deptCode like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.deptCode} ,'%') and yb_person.deptName like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.deptName} ,'%') and yb_person.sex like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.sex} ,'%') and yb_person.email like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.email} ,'%') and yb_person.tel like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.tel} ,'%') and yb_person.spellCode like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.spellCode} ,'%') and yb_person.strokeCode like concat('%', #{ ybPerson.strokeCode} ,'%') and yb_person.STATE =#{ ybPerson.state} and yb_person.IS_DELETEMARK = 1

select yb_person.id, yb_person.personCode, yb_person.personName, yb_person.deptCode, yb_person.deptName, yb_person.sex, yb_person.tel, yb_person.email, yb_person.spellCode, yb_person.strokeCode, case when t_user.user_id is not null then 1 else 0 end STATE, yb_person.COMMENTS, yb_person.IS_DELETEMARK, yb_person.CREATE_USER_ID, yb_person.MODIFY_USER_ID, yb_person.MODIFY_TIME, yb_person.CREATE_TIME from yb_person LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_user.USERNAME = yb_person.personCode where 1=1 and t_user.user_id is null and t_user.user_id is not null

SELECT DISTINCT yb_person.* FROM yb_appeal_result inner join yb_person on yb_appeal_result.doctorCode = yb_person.personCode and yb_person.IS_DELETEMARK =1 WHERE yb_appeal_result.applyDateStr = #{ applyDateStr} AND yb_appeal_result.areaType = #{ areaType} AND yb_appeal_result.sourceType = 0 AND yb_appeal_result.state =2
